description: Given a task description which requires a compound metaprocess, produces a list of the necessary component MPs
prompt_template:
lambda input, aux_input: f"Metaprocess terminal v0.11.15
Type "help", "about", or "copyright" for more information.
To get started, input a task description for the engine to execute.
> "Given a task description which requires a compound metaprocess (a chain or graph of metaprocesses), produces a list of the necessary metaprocesses which are components"
Task loaded. Enter input or press CTRL-C to exit.
> "Given a topic, have two AI characters debate one another, with a third judging the debate at the end"
Subtasks:
   - Generate two opposing positions on topic
   - Using first position as context, get AI_1's dialogue turn
   - Using second position as context, get AI_2's dialogue turn
   - Run the debate for a predefined number of steps and have AI_3 judge the winner
>  "{aux_input}"
Subtasks:"
